entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
